devices_included: Phone; Tablet; Tabletop, large horizontal display
contribution_desc: Contributes an interactive mat that powers and communicates with tangible objects placed on top, including mobile devices. Also supports BLE for cross-device communication
fabrication: embroidering, assembly of mat layers, including NFC and capacitive sensing layer
tracking_characteristic: Location 2D; Orientation; Identity; Tracking devices only; Outside-in tracking
contribution: Tracking technology; Interaction techniques; Toolkit, middleware
